name: Last Wish
body:
## Last Wish

An open source Ultima Online RunUO Freeshard hoping to fulfill one last wish. Everyone is welcome!

### Three Steps to Join

1. Download and unzip [UO Client 7.0.15.1](http://felladrin.com/download/UOClassicSetup_7_0_15_1.zip "UOClassicSetup_7_0_15_1.zip (UO Client 7.0.15.1, Publish 51, June 15 2011)")
2. Download and install [Razor](http://www.uogamers.com/razor/)
3. Launch Razor and setup:

![Razor](https://i.imgur.com/UKAwChb.png)  
UO Data Directory: *The folder you've just unziped*  
Server: *lastwish.servegame.com*  
Port: *2593*

### Source Code

You can download the shard source code [here](https://github.com/felladrin/last-wish), and run your own custom Last Wish server!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
